greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle T(n,k) = binomial(2*n-k, k)*binomial(n+k, 2*k), read by rows.
link: G. C. Greubel, Rows n = 0..100 of the triangle, flattened
formula: T(n, k) = binomial(2*n-k, k)*binomial(n+k, 2*k) = A054142(n, k)*A085478(n, k).
program: (Sage) flatten([[binomial(2*n-k, k)*binomial(n+k, 2*k) for k in (0..n)] for n in (0..10)]) # _G. C. Greubel_, Feb 22 2021
(Magma) [Binomial(2*n-k, k)*Binomial(n+k, 2*k): k in [0..n], n in [0..10]]; // _G. C. Greubel_, Feb 22 2021
results.author: _Roger L. Bagula_, Dec 19 2009
